project.name: YORI
project.description: Phase 2: Add optional enforcement mode to YORI - block LLM requests based on policies with allowlist and override mechanisms.

workers.description: Implement enforcement mode with explicit user consent, per-policy enforcement toggles, and mode switching UI (observe/advisory/enforce)
Create friendly block page with policy explanation, reason, timestamp, and request override option with password authentication
Build device allowlist (never block these IPs), time-based exceptions, and emergency override mechanism with management UI
Enhance audit logging for enforcement: log all blocks, policy triggers, user overrides, and create enforcement dashboard widgets
Integrate all Phase 2 components, merge with Phase 1 code, perform enforcement testing, build v0.2.0 release with updated documentation
